author: Simon Difford
description: Based on cognac and named after one of the three wise men, this cocktail uses three spices – ginger, cloves and saffron (in the Bénédictine) and a good dash of red wine (after all, in later life the baby they visited reputedly turned water into wine).
name: Melchior

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
